thread.section_title: Travelopod Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Travelopod | travelopod.com
thread.title: Muralidhar Kumar

author: Muralidhar Kumar
title: Muralidhar Kumar
text: Had booked a ticket for my parents and they had said that it was charged in splits but it was split in thrice ( no overcharge though) but 2 charges of 1150 clearly state the airlines name but remaining 207$ says charged by Travelopod inc. I suspect that they are charging as a commision Even though I agree that I had accepted for 1250X2 due to availability circumstances 207$ is what if they had taken a commision then its really bad Not booking through any agents from the next time
